property.label: News Edit URL
property.description: After Clicking on Edit button, It will redirect to record edit form which is Create News component

property.name: editNewsLabel
property.label: Edit News Button Label
property.description: Button label for authorised users to edit the article.

property.name: deleteNewsLabel
property.label: Delete News Button Label
property.description: Button label for authorised users to delete the article.

property.name: showFollowButton
property.label: Enable follow button
property.description: Hide follow button if feed tracking is not enabled on the News object in the community

property.name: showLikeButton
property.label: Enable like button
property.description: Allow users to like news articles

property.name: allowShowSource
property.label: Allow Show Source Button
property.description: Adds a Show Source button to the page to allow for editing of the raw HTML within the editor.

property.name: limitToSpecificGroups
property.label: Enable Limit to Specific Groups
property.description: Check to limit to specified collaboration groups

property.name: editsRequireTopics
property.label: Require topics on Edit?
property.description: Should the users be required to use topics when editing

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Automatically bind the page's record id to the component variable
